creator: Coral Health
descriptionHtml:
Are you still physically carrying your own medical records from one appointment to another, filling out the same paperwork every time you visit a new doctor or healthcare provider, or simply unable to access your medical information? Perhaps you’re logging in to various hospital patient portals or apps, but have never been able to combine all your health data in one place.

Introducing Coral Health, the app that provides you with the unprecedented ability to collect and control your medical records from the many places you receive care. Easily search through your medical history, monitor your vitals and track your health trends. You can also view a list of your prescriptions, allergies, immunizations as well as procedures and conditions.

NATIONWIDE ACCESS
We connect users to nearly 600 healthcare organizations across the U.S. and are rapidly expanding the number of organizations connected to the app.

SECURE AND PRIVATE
All of your medical record data is encrypted both in transit and at rest on your device. No health information is accessible to Coral Health or anyone else unless you decide to share it.

MULTI-USER FUNCTIONALITY
Our app allows parents and legal guardians to access and manage their children’s records. You can also set up separate profiles for your spouse or other family members who have given you access to their medical records.

Download the app to see the complete list of healthcare organizations we support. If you've visited healthcare organizations that aren't in the app yet, just ask the organizations to connect to Coral Health and they will be legally required to do so.
descriptionShort: Manage Your Medical Records: Medications, Vitals, Lab Results & More
title: Coral Health - Control Your Medical Records

creator: Coral Health
descriptionHtml:
Manage your medications 💊, get notifications ⏰, track your key health metrics ❤️, and pull in your official medical records 🏥 with Coral Health!

Features:
• Pill reminders, with the option to snooze or skip a medication
• Import a list of your medications using your Medicare account
• Get notified when your medications need to be refilled
• Multiple notifications per medication
• Enter and track health metrics like weight, blood pressure, and blood glucose
• Pull in your official medical records from a doctor or hospital
• Manage your loved ones’ healthcare in separate profiles
• Monitor trends in your health and get advanced warning of any issues
• View your immunization records
• Understand your lab results


Coral Health is a free personal healthcare management app that allows you to consolidate and track your medications, create reminders for taking pills, consolidate your medical records, and keep track of key metrics like blood pressure, weight, blood glucose, and mood.

Coral Health also makes it easier for parents and caregivers to make the best health decisions for their loved ones. Import a list of your or your dependents' medications from Medicare. Keep track of your children’s immunizations, allergies, vaccines, and development or stay on top of your elderly parents’ conditions, treatments, and prescriptions. Take ownership of your family’s healthcare with the free Coral Health app today!

SECURE AND PRIVATE
All of your medical record data is encrypted both in transit and at rest on your device. No personal health information is accessible to Coral Health or anyone else unless you decide to share it.

NATIONWIDE ACCESS
We connect users to nearly 600 healthcare organizations across the U.S. and are rapidly expanding the number of organizations connected to the app.

Download the app to see the complete list of healthcare organizations we support. If you've visited healthcare organizations that aren't in the app yet, just ask the organizations to connect to Coral Health and they will be legally required to do so.

Combine your electronic health records from patient portals such as MyChart, healow, FollowMyHealth, HealtheLife.

Coral Health is a free personal healthcare management app that allows you to consolidate and track your medications, create reminders for taking pills, consolidate your medical records, and keep track of key metrics like blood pressure, weight, blood glucose, and mood.

Coral Health also makes it easier for parents and caregivers to make the best health decisions for their loved ones. Import a list of your or your dependents' medications from Medicare. Keep track of your children’s immunizations, allergies, vaccines, and development or stay on top of your elderly parents’ conditions, treatments, and prescriptions. Take ownership of your family’s healthcare with the free Coral Health app today!

SECURE AND PRIVATE
All of your medical record data is encrypted both in transit and at rest on your device. No personal health information is accessible to Coral Health or anyone else unless you decide to share it.

NATIONWIDE ACCESS
We connect users to nearly 600 healthcare organizations across the U.S. and are rapidly expanding the number of organizations connected to the app.

Download the app to see the complete list of healthcare organizations we support. If you've visited healthcare organizations that aren't in the app yet, just ask the organizations to connect to Coral Health and they will be legally required to do so.

Combine your electronic health records from patient portals such as MyChart, healow, FollowMyHealth, HealtheLife.
descriptionShort: Track meds, set pill reminders, monitor health trends, import medicine list.
title: Coral Health App
